name: Un-Stabled (Sophia/cats, funemaker)
description:
Across the salty spray of the ocean, in a faraway land, there was a farmer, a stable, and a horse. The farming life was a monotonous nightmare. Aching hooves, bitter feed, and sightless days. One day, an innocent kick changed everything.

 Once you escape from the stable life, what will you do? In a fit of adrenaline-aided rage, you take out your temper on the farmer's things. Now you've done it. You'd better run, that farmer looks angry. Get as far away from that stable as you can before it's too late. And don't forget to kick stuff on your journey, you are an un-stabled horse after all!

Escape the farmer, navigate the sea, and get as far away as you can!

****************** Un-Stabled ******************

Game Objective: Escape and kick stuff

Controls: AD to move, SPACE to jump, LEFT-MOUSE to kick

(Created for a 48-hour game jam)

Programming :: Jon Fisher

Art :: Sophia Fisher

Testing :: Adrian Fisher
